Package com.Game

Class Component<T>

java.lang.Object
com.File.Serialize
com.Game.Component<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of component
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bounds, Button, CameraControls, Coin, Grid, Ground, LevelEditorControls, MainContainer, MenuItem, Music, ParallaxBG, Percentage, PipePart, Player, Portal, ProgressBar, RigidBody, Sprite, TabItem, TextField
public abstract class Component<T> extends Serialize
Generic abstract class = any class can override this.
